title: Ivanka Trump shows off short new bob: ‘A haircut will never fix her problems’
text:
Ivanka Trump debuted her new bob hairstyle as she headed to Colombia. (Photo: REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque)

Short hair, don’t care.

Ivanka Trump has chopped off her long locks in favor of a sleek new bob, which she debuted during her trip to South America over Labor Day weekend. The senior White House adviser is visiting Colombia, Argentina and Paraguay to promote the Women’s Global Development and Prosperity Initiative.

The first daughter showed off her new ‘do as she boarded a plane for her first stop in Bogotá on Monday. She paired her sleek new style with a summery navy halter-neck J.Crew dress cinched with a wide red belt.

View photos Trump met with Colombian Vice President Marta Lucía Ramirez in Bogotá. (Photo: REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque) More

The 37-year-old changed into a white suit dress for her meeting with Colombian Vice President Marta Lucía Ramirez and wore a flutter-sleeved olive green number on Tuesday.

Today we launched the Academy of Women Entrepreneurs. I was honored to meet the 1st participants – a dynamic group of 40 women entrepreneurs! These formidable women embody the spirit of the future & I look forward to seeing their successes influence our world for the better.#WGDP pic.twitter.com/vHC3ZUQAR8 — Ivanka Trump (@IvankaTrump) September 3, 2019

Her cropped look marks the second cut the first daughter — whose long blond hairstyle was subject to both raves from her fans as well as “Nepotism Barbie” jabs from critics — has undergone this summer. The vacation photos she posted in August revealed a shoulder-length look.

The new collar-length bob, meanwhile, has been received with both cheers and jeers.

She probably thinks the haircut makes her look more grown up. — mary franklin (@rayo554) September 2, 2019

A haircut will Never fix her problems #IvankaTrump — Mark Candler (@MarkCandler) September 2, 2019

Love the shorter bob Ivanka 💚 Thanks for your great work. We support you 100%. — KatQuinn (@quinn_katana) September 3, 2019

4 photos of her might seem excessive, but it was an expensive haircut. — MsShugenah (@Michugenah) September 3, 2019

love love love the bob!!! — Sara Glaz (@SaraGlaz) September 3, 2019

The mom of three made headlines alongside younger sister Tiffany last week after President Trump’s personal assistant, Madeleine Westerhout, reportedly claimed to have a better relationship with him than his own daughters. Westerhout, who has resigned over her controversial comments, also alleged that Trump disparaged Tiffany’s physical appearance.
